-.short_title: Managing in Healthcare 醫療管理

description.ENG: This course focuses on the practical aspects of management and supplements that of modules "Health Policy and Management" and "Healthcare Organisation and Management" to complete the training in healthcare management.  Teaching will include lectures and discussions; as well as exercises and interactive games to enhance management insights.

H.short_title: Revenue Mgt in Hosp Industry 酒店旅遊業收益管理

description.ENG: This course helps students learn how to apply the principles of revenue management effectively as they apply to the hospitality industry by following the concept of allocating the right type of capacity to the right kind of customer at the right price so as to maximize revenue. Focus is placed on the integration of revenue management techniques with information technology, internal management issues, and external marketing concerns. Topics include theories on revenue management, forecasting, overbooking, group decisions, and management and marketing issues. Students will be exposed to how hospitality organizations use revenue management technique to determine their pricing strategy to maximize their revenue.
description.ZHS: 本学科帮助学生学习如何有效地运用收益管理的原则，将合适的酒店客房用合适的价格卖给合适的客户，从而最大限度地提高收益。学科着重在收益管理技术与信息系统的整合，内部管理问题，和外部营销的关系。内容包括收益管理的理论，预测，超售，集体订房决策，以及管理和营销问题。学生将接触到酒店旅游业如何使用收益管理技术，以确定他们的定价策略，以最大限度地提高他们的收益。
description.ZHT: 本學科幫助學生學習如何有效地運用收益管理的原則，將合適的酒店客房用合適的價格賣給合適的客戶，從而最大限度地提高收益。學科著重在收益管理技術與資訊系統的整合，內部管理問題，和外部營銷的關係。內容包括收益管理的理論，預測，超售，集體訂房決策，以及管理和營銷問題。學生將接觸到酒店旅遊業如何使用收益管理技術，以確定他們的定價策略，以最大限度地提高他們的收益。

info.requirement: For students in MSc in Management of Real Estate and Hospitality Assets

H.short_title: Glo Asset Alloct'n R Est Secu 全球地產證券資產配置

description.ENG: This course provides theoretical foundation for global asset allocation with the applications to real estate securities. Topics include international CAPM and multifactor models in global asset allocation as well as the strategies and tactics of real estate securities portfolio management. Using investment games, students will be introduced to both the conventional wisdom and cotemporary methods used in managing a global real estate securities portfolio. Students in this course will have completed (or are concurrently enrolled in) the relevant prerequisite courses in finance, accounting and statistics.
description.ZHS: 本学科讲述全球资产配置的基本原理和理论基础，并应用在房地产证券。内容包括用于全球资产配置的国际资本资产定价和多因素模型，基本的房地产证券组合管理的长短线的策略。本学科采用模拟投资的方法，教导学生如何管理一个全球房地产证券组合的传统理论和实践艺术。选修该学科的学生应该具备一定的金融、会计和统计的背景知识。
description.ZHT: 本學科講述全球資產配置的基本原理和理論基礎，並應用在房地產證券。內容包括用於全球資產配置的國際資本資產定價和多因素模型，基本的房地產證券組合管理的長短線的策略。本學科採用模擬投資的方法，教導學生如何管理一個全球房地產證券組合的傳統理論和實踐藝術。選修該學科的學生應該具備一定的金融、會計和統計的背景知識。

info.requirement: For students in MSc in Management of Real Estate and Hospitality Assets

title.ENG: Global Asset Allocation on Real Estate Securities
title.ZHS: 全球地产证券资产配置
title.ZHT: 全球地產證券資產配置

H.short_title: ESS & Ind Consulting Studies 行政主管講座及行業咨詢研究

description.ENG: This course aims to provide an immersive experience for students to integrate theory and practice. The course consists of two parts. Part I is designed as a series of executive speeches. Industry leaders in the hospitality, tourism and real estate sectors in Asia are invited to participate and speak on the investment and development strategies of their companies and the existing and emerging trends,  challenges, and opportunities facing their industries. Students are required to research and study the company and the industry prior to engaging the speaker. The executive speaker series provides the students with opportunities to learn leading companies’ current strategies and best practices, and gain strategic insights through interacting with the industry leaders. Part II consists of consulting projects conducted by students. Project objectives and contents will be designed by the participating company(ies) and the course instructor(s) collaboratively. The projects will be centered on conducting a strategic diagnosis for the participating company and proposing solutions/actions to improve the company’s competitiveness and performance. In addition to the emphasis on companies’ operational and financial success, special attention will be placed on the sustainability and integrity issues that are important for companies competing in the hospitality, tourism and real estate industries in Asia. Students learn to apply up-to-date theories and analytical tools and are encouraged to come up with innovative solutions for the participating companies.
description.ZHS: 本学科旨在为学生提供理论联系实践的亲身经验。课程分两个环节。第一环节包括一系列行政主管讲座。课程将邀请亚洲区酒店、旅游及房地产行业经验丰富的高阶管理人员与同学分享经验，解析行业所面临的发展趋势，挑战与商机。作为参与讲座前的准备工作，学生需要搜集研究相关公司与行业之背景资料。讲座系列令学生有机会学习到顶尖公司的最新经营策略与最佳管理实务，在与行业领袖的交流中拓宽策略视野。课程第二环节为学生提供参与咨询课题的机会。课题目标与内容将由公司与教师共同设计，主旨在于对参与公司进行策略诊断分析，提供提升公司竞争力与业绩的解决方案。咨询课题的重点不仅在于公司营运与财务方面的成功，更强调可持续性与商业伦理的重要性。学生将学习运用最新理论与分析工具，尝试为参与公司提供创新方案。
description.ZHT: 本學科旨在為學生提供理論聯繫實踐的親身經驗。學科分兩個環節。第一環節包括一系列行政主管講座。學科將邀請亞洲區酒店、旅遊及房地產行業經驗豐富的高階管理人員與同學分享經驗，解析行業所面臨的發展趨勢，挑戰與商機。作為參與講座前的準備工作，學生需要搜集研究相關公司與行業之背景資料。講座系列令學生有機會學習到頂尖公司的最新經營策略與最佳管理實務，在與行業領袖的交流中拓寬策略視野。學科第二環節為學生提供參與咨詢課題的機會。課題目標與內容將由公司與教師共同設計，主旨在於對參與公司進行策略診斷分析，提供提升公司競爭力與業績的解決方案。咨詢課題的重點不僅在於公司營運與財務方面的成功，更強調可持續性與商業倫理的重要性。學生將學習運用最新理論與分析工具，嘗試為參與公司提供創新方案。

info.requirement: For students of MSc in Management of Real Estate and Hospitality Asssets

title.ENG: Executive Speaker Series and Industry Consulting Studies
title.ZHS: 行政主管讲座及行业咨询研究
title.ZHT: 行政主管講座及行業咨詢研究

description.ENG: This course provides an opportunity for the MBA students to apply what they have learned in the classroom to solving real-world business problems. A minimum of three and a maximum of five students are required to form a project team, under the supervision of a BA faculty member. A project proposal outlining the work to be undertaken by the project team must be approved by the supervising faculty member and endorsed by the Director of MBA Programmes or his/her representative within 10 calendar days from the start of the term. The project must be sponsored by a company in Hong Kong and approved by the Director. The sponsorship includes joint supervision of the project by an appointed senior staff of the company, pledge of assistance and support to ensure the successful completion of the project, and possible remuneration to members of the project team, other than the supervising faculty member, for the work undertaken. Students are expected to spend, on the average, one day a week throughout the duration of the project. The project duration must cover the term time as published by the University calendar, but should not exceed four months in duration. A final report of the project to be submitted to the supervising faculty member and an oral presentation of the results to the management of the sponsor is part of the requirements of the course. The final grades of the students will be determined by the supervising faculty member, in which the evaluation of the project by the sponsoring body should be reflected.  MBA (Evening Mode) and MBA (Weekend Mode) students are eligible to register the course subject to the Director's approval.
description.ZHT: 本科目提供機會予MBA學生運用在課堂上所學知識解決現實世界的業務問題。項目小組於工商管理學院教學人員指導下由最少三位至最多五位學生組成。項目計劃書需概述項目小組即將進行的工作，並需從學期開始的十個日曆天內得到指導教員的批准及MBA課程主任或他/她的代表的認可。該項目必須由香港公司資助及得到課程主任的批准。資助包括由該公司內指定的高級職員共同指導該項目，承諾提供援助和支持以確保項目順利完成，和或會給予項目成員，除了指導教員外，為所進行工作的酬勞。整個項目期間學生預計平均會花每週一天於項目工作上。該項目持續時間必須涵蓋大學校曆公佈的學期時間，但不應超過四個月。提交項目的最終報告給指導資助公司及口述演講項目結果予資助公司管理層是科目要求的一部分。學生的最終成績將由指導教員決定，從中反映由資助機構對項目的評估。晚間制與週末制MBA學生必須得到課程主任的批准，方可修讀本科目。

info.requirement: For students in Full-time MBA; or MBA (Evening Mode); or MBA (Weekend Mode); or JD/MBA Double Degree Programme

XB.short_title: Selected Topics in Business 商業專題

description.ENG: This course provides students with an opportunity to further their knowledge in selected areas of business.  Topics and issues of current and emerging interest are discussed and explored.  Throughout this course, student initiative and participation in discussion and projects related to the selected topics will be emphasized.
description.ZHS: This course provides students with an opportunity to further their knowledge in selected areas of business.  Topics and issues of current and emerging interest are discussed and explored.  Throughout this course, student initiative and participation in discussion and projects related to the selected topics will be emphasized.
description.ZHT: 本科目為學生提供機會以促進他們對商業選題知識的認識，及討論和探討當前和新興的主題和議題。過程中將著重學生對有關選題討論及項目之主動性和參與。

info.requirement: For students in Full-time MBA; or MBA (Evening Mode); or MBA (Weekend Mode); or JD/MBA Double Degree Programme

-.short_title: Graduation Project 畢業報告

description.ENG: •	A 5,000-word research-based dissertation involving protocol writing up, data analysis and reporting of results and discussion on a topic related to endocrinology, diabetes or metabolic medicine
description.ZHS: 根据已提供的数据库, 就某常见医学问题, 撰写一篇 5 千字的研究计划。巩固和提高对各种临床研究项目之计划、准备及数据分析的知识和技巧。
description.ZHT: •	學生需撰寫5000字的研究論文，內容包括記錄、數據分析、報告結果和討論有關內分泌、糖尿病或代謝疾病的內容。並根據提供的數據，指出一種常見醫學的問題。

info.requirement: For students in MSc Endocrinology, Diabetes & Metabolism

EE.short_title: Selected Topics in Management 管理學專題研討

F.short_title: Selected Topics in Management 管理學專題研討

VV.short_title: Selected Topics in Management 管理學專題研討

description.ENG: This course is designed to further the knowledge of research and theory in the various special areas in the field of management.
description.ZHS: This course is designed to further the knowledge of research and theory in the various special areas in the field of management.
description.ZHT: 本科目旨在增進在管理學範疇中不同專題的研究和理論的知識。

info.requirement: For students in Full-time MBA; or MBA (Evening Mode); or MBA (Weekend Mode); or JD/MBA Double Degree Programme

description.ENG: Encountering an increasingly competitive business environment, how managers interpreting and responding to it is crucial to the success of a business. This course is designed to provide students with a concept of competition and an understanding of the role of managers in the process of strategy formulation, implementation, and evaluation. Major topics include organizational mission, analysis of business environment, strategic planning, formulation and implementation of strategies at both business and corporate level, strategic change, and strategic evaluation and control. Cases, in-depth readings, and contemporary issues will be discussed in the class.
description.ZHT: 面對一個競爭日益激烈的營商環境，管理者如何理解和回應對企業的成功至為重要。本科目旨在為學生提供競爭的理念和對管理者在制定、實施和評估策略的過程中作所扮演的角色的理解。主要課題包括企業使命、營商環境分析、策略規劃、在業務和企業層面的策略制定和實施、策略轉變，以及策略評估和控制等。在課堂上將會討論案例、全面性閱讀資料和當代議題。

info.requirement: For students in Full-time MBA; or MBA (Evening Mode); or MBA (Weekend Mode); or JD/MBA Double Degree Programme

description.ENG: This is a capstone course. Topics to be discussed include: programme strategy versus grand strategy, formulating business strategies, strategic choice, relations between business strategy and structure, strategic management of human resources, strategy evaluation and control, and the management of change. The course is conducted in an interactive and seminar style.
description.ZHT: 這是一核心學科。內容包括：個體戰略與總體戰略，制定企業戰略，戰略選擇，企業策略與結構的關係、人力資源的策略管理、策略評價和控制及變革管理。本學科以互動和研討的方式進行。

info.requirement: For students in EMBA; or EMBA (Chinese)

description.ENG: Effective managers must not only develop winning strategies, but they must also implement them. To do so, managers have to understand the full complexity of organizations, adopt effective tactics, and apply appropriate tools to get things done.  The main purpose of this course is to prepare students to successfully lead organizations and their units. This entails developing knowledge and skills to analyze key issues in organizational structure, power and influence, culture, change, and governance.
description.ZHS: Effective managers must not only develop winning strategies, but they must also implement them. To do so, managers have to understand the full complexity of organizations, adopt effective tactics, and apply appropriate tools to get things done.  The main purpose of this course is to prepare students to successfully lead organizations and their units. This entails developing knowledge and skills to analyze key issues in organizational structure, power and influence, culture, change, and governance.
description.ZHT: 有效的管理者不僅要制定，亦必須履行制勝的策略。要做到這一點，管理者需要全面了解公司的複雜性，採取有效的戰術，並運用適當的工具把事情做好。本科目的主要目的是幫助學生成功地領導公司機構及其部門。因此，就需要發展知識和技能來分析組織的結構、權力和影響力、文化、改革和治理等的關鍵議題。

info.requirement: For students in Full-time MBA; or MBA (Evening Mode); or MBA (Weekend Mode); or JD/MBA Double Degree Programme

description.ENG: This course is designed to illustrate how marketing management varies the marketing mix (product, price, promotion, and place) to achieve maximum consumer satisfaction. Emphasis is placed on the basic marketing concept that a firm's long-run market position is enhanced by creation of a differential advantage while meeting consumer desires. Also discussed are marketing strategy (formulation and implementation) and the role of the firm vis-à-vis its various environments (e.g., social, political, economic, etc.).
description.ZHT: 本學科目的在闡明營銷管理如何改變營銷組合（產品、價格、促銷和地點）來最大化顧客滿意度。本學科重點放在基本營銷概念：創造差別優勢的同時滿足消費者需求會提升一個公司長期的市場地位。此外，本學科討論營銷策略（規劃和執行），以及公司的角色相對於其不同的環境（例如：社交、政治、經濟等）。

info.requirement: For students in Full-time MBA; or MBA (Evening Mode); or MBA (Weekend Mode); or JD/MBA Double Degree Programme; or MSc Marketing; or EMBA; or EMBA (Chinese)

E.short_title: Service Marketing 服務市場營銷

description.ENG: This course reviews the important concepts in service marketing. It addresses the issues involved in the effective marketing of services taking into account the unique characteristics of services. The issues which are covered include: the interactive nature of the service provider, the consumer and the physical environment in the service provision process; the importance to maintain high quality; and special problems related to the growth and internationalization of services.
description.ZHT: 本學科討論服務市場營銷中的重要概念。話題涉及有效服務營銷中考慮的服務特質。本學科的話題包括：服務提供者的交互特性，服務提供過程中的消費者和物理環境，維持高質量的重要性，以及服務發展和國際化中的特殊問題。

info.requirement: For students in Full-time MBA; or MBA (Evening Mode); or MBA (Weekend Mode); or JD/MBA Double Degree Programme; or MSc Marketing

M.short_title: Organizational Marketing 企業巿場營銷

description.ENG: The major objectives of this course are to develop an understanding of the unique features, behaviour and problems of organizational marketing as compared to consumer marketing and to show how to apply the marketing managerial process (e.g., market segmentation, target market selection, development of the marketing mix) to the field of organizational marketing. The course is concerned with the application of modern marketing principles to organizational customers, including profit and non-profit organizations such as industrial buyers, government and social service institutions.
description.ZHT: 本學科的主要目標是發展對企業營銷中的特性、行為和問題的理解，相比於消費者營銷而言，以及展示如何將營銷管理過程（例如：市場細分、目標市場選擇、營銷組合的發展）應用到企業營銷領域。本學科關注應用現代營銷的原則到企業客戶，包括盈利和非營利機構（例如：企業用戶、政府和社會服務機構）。

info.requirement: For students in Full-time MBA; or MBA (Evening Mode); or MBA (Weekend Mode); or JD/MBA Double Degree Programme; or MSc Marketing

description.ENG: This course covers major marketing decisions in a problem oriented setting, the in-depth study of general marketing management, and the development of marketing plans and strategies. Emphasis is placed on integrating and applying analytical techniques, and interfunctional aspects of marketing.
description.ZHT: 本學科涵蓋了以問題為導向設置的重大營銷決策，一般營銷管理的深入研究，以及營銷計劃和策略的發展。重要是放在整合和應用分析技術以及市場營銷的多方面協調。

info.requirement: For students in Full-time MBA; or MBA (Evening Mode); or MBA (Weekend Mode); or JD/MBA Double Degree Programme; or MSc Marketing

M.short_title: Global Marketing Management 環球營銷管理

description.ENG: In this electronic age, multinational marketers will face a fast changing marketing environment. Globalization of business activities will no longer be the privilege of firms in the advanced countries. Existing concepts and theories in international marketing are being challenged for their abilities in solving problems in this electronic era. This course is designed to link theories with business practices. Topics include analyses of the underlying forces in international business, and the recent development of theoretical concepts and theories in the area of international marketing. Marketing strategies will be discussed for operations in both advanced and emerging economies.
description.ZHT: 在這個電子時代，跨國營銷者將面臨一個快速變化的市場環境。全球化經營不再是發達國家公司的特權。環球營銷現有的概念和理論正在受到在這個電子時代解決問題能力的挑戰。本學科的目的是將理論與商業實踐聯系起來。主題包括國際業務的潛在力量的分析，以及理論概念和理論在國際營銷領域的最新發展。營銷戰略將討論發達和新興經濟體的業務。

info.requirement: For students in Full-time MBA; or MBA (Evening Mode); or MBA (Weekend Mode); or JD/MBA Double Degree Programme; or MSc Marketing

M.short_title: Strategic Brand Management 策略品牌管理

description.ENG: One of the most important assets of any business is tangible: its brands. As industries become increasingly competitive, it is clear that strong brand-building skills are needed to survive and prosper. The Strategic Brand Management course is designed to provide conceptual background as well as practical approaches (i.e., relevant research techniques) to manage brands as a strategic asset as well as a primary source of competitive advantage. Topics include new product development process, brand creation, brand building, measuring/monitoring brand equity, and revitalizing brands. Although brands are one of the most important assets for any business, it is found that managers generally do not have very clear idea how to successfully manage their brands. Far too few managers really understand the concept of brand equity and how it must be implemented. In other words, managers need to learn the basic brand building concepts as well as the research techniques that can be used to collect data for brand planning. The objective of this course is to provide students with understanding regarding brand building concepts as well as to equip students with research techniques that can be used to build and manage a successful brand.
description.ZHT: 任何一個企業最重要的資產是有形的：它的品牌。隨著行業競爭日趨激烈，很顯然，強大的品牌建設能力是生存和繁榮的必需。策略品牌管理學科的目的是提供概念背景以及使用的方法（即相關研究技術）來管理品牌作為策略資產和競爭優勢的主要來源。主題包括新產品開發流程，品牌創建，品牌建設，測量/監測品牌資產和振興品牌。儘管品牌是任何企業最重要的資產之一，然而管理者一般不會對如何成功管理自己的品牌有很清晰的概念。太少的管理者真正理解品牌資產的概念以及應該怎樣執行。換句話說，管理者需要學習基本的品牌建設理念，以及可用於收集品牌規劃數據的研究技術。本學科的目的是使學生了解有關品牌建設的概念，以及使學生具備可用於構建和管理一個成功品牌的研究技術。

info.requirement: For students in Full-time MBA; or MBA (Evening Mode); or MBA (Weekend Mode); or JD/MBA Double Degree Programme; or MSc Marketing

description.ENG: This course deals with a new paradigm of marketing management in modern enterprise. It primarily explores the business implications of fascinating developments including computer networking, artificial intelligence, hypermedia, and visual arts of the emergence of electronic commerce in the electronic world. In addition to acquiring basic skills for navigating this newly developed mass medium, students are required to create personal and business electronic presence on the World Wide Web, and to develop a new perspective about marketing in 21st century.
description.ZHT: 本學科涉及營銷管理在現代企業的新典範。它主要探討激動人心的發展對商業的影響，包括計算機網絡，人工智能，超媒體，以及電子商務在電子世界出現的視覺藝術。除了掌握這些新開發的大眾媒體的基本技能，學生也需要在互聯網上創建個人和商業的營銷廣告，並發展21世紀營銷的新視角。

info.requirement: For students in Full-time MBA; or MBA (Evening Mode); or MBA (Weekend Mode); or JD/MBA Double Degree Programme; or MSc Marketing

description.ENG: This course introduces current research and thought on the negotiation process, and provides opportunities for course participants to apply the concepts and skills in simulations of actual negotiations. Strategic lessons are learned from different actual cases. The objective is to enable course participants to appreciate the art and science of negotiation, to understand how to resolve conflicts and derive the most out of bargaining.
description.ZHT: 本學科介紹談判過程的目前的研究與思考，並提供機會讓學生在模擬談判中應用學到的概念和技能。從不同的實際案例中能學到談判策略的經驗教訓。本學科的目標是使學生體會到談判的藝術和科學，了解如何解決衝突，並從討價還價中獲得最好結果。

info.requirement: For students in Full-time MBA; or MBA (Evening Mode); or MBA (Weekend Mode); or JD/MBA Double Degree Programme; or EMBA; or EMBA (Chinese)

P.short_title: Seminar in Marketing 市場學專題研討

description.ENG: This course provides students with an opportunity to further their knowledge in selected areas in marketing such as internet marketing, business negotiation, bank marketing, telecommunication marketing, and the like. Topics and issues of current interest will be discussed as well. Throughout this series of seminars, students' initiation and participation in discussion and projects related to the selected topics will be emphasized. Owing to the specifi c nature of the course, topics to be discussed will vary from term to term.
description.ZHT: 本學科為學生提供了一個提升他們知識的機會，在選定的營銷領域，例如互聯網營銷，商務談判，營銷營銷，電信營銷等。當前關心的話題和問題也將被討論。在本學科的講座將強調學生在關於選定話題討論和項目的參與。由於學科中的具體性質，每一期的話題會有所不同。

info.requirement: For students in EMBA (Chinese)

M.short_title: Practicum for Managerial Mktg 管理營銷實習

description.ENG: The objective of this course is to give students advanced practical marketing research techniques as well as hand-on experience in solving marketing problems in the real-world environment.  The course consists of some lectures on advanced but practical marketing research techniques and a group project.  In the group project, students will work closely with the marketing manager of a firm to solve his or her marketing problem(s) by using primary marketing research.  Students will need to do presentation to the firm’s marketing and/or management team as well as submitting a detailed written report or marketing plan.
description.ZHS: The objective of this course is to give students advanced practical marketing research techniques as well as hand-on experience in solving marketing problems in the real-world environment.  The course consists of some lectures on advanced but practical marketing research techniques and a group project.  In the group project, students will work closely with the marketing manager of a firm to solve his or her marketing problem(s) by using primary marketing research.  Students will need to do presentation to the firm’s marketing and/or management team as well as submitting a detailed written report or marketing plan.
description.ZHT: 本學科的目的是培養學生先進實用的市場調研技術和實踐經驗，以此在現實世界中解決市場營銷的問題。學科包括一些講座和一個小組項目，講座將教授學生先進但實用的市場調研技術。在小組項目中，學生將與一間公司的營銷經理緊密合作，通過基本的市場調研來解決他/她的營銷難題。學生需要向該公司營銷部門或管理層演示方案，並提交一份詳細的報告或營銷計劃。

info.requirement:
For students in MSc in Marketing
Prerequisite: MKTG5011

M.short_title: Practicum for Big Data Mktg 大數據營銷實習

description.ENG: The objective of this course is to provide students hand-on experience to solve big data marketing problems in the real-world environment. The course consists of lectures on big data software, big data group projects, meetings, reports and presentations. The big data project can be a data mining project or a text mining project or a voice mining project. Students work on the real world data and collaborate closely with the staff of the Marketing Engineering Center to deliver joint solutions to the big data marketing problems in the industry.
description.ZHS: The objective of this course is to provide students hand-on experience to solve big data marketing problems in the real-world environment. The course consists of lectures on big data software, big data group projects, meetings, reports and presentations. The big data project can be a data mining project or a text mining project or a voice mining project. Students work on the real world data and collaborate closely with the staff of the Marketing Engineering Center to deliver joint solutions to the big data marketing problems in the industry.
description.ZHT: 本學科的目的是培養學生在現實世界中解決大數據營銷問題的實踐經驗。學科包括大數據軟件講座、大數據小組項目、會議、報告及演示。大數據項目的形式可以是一個數據挖掘、文本挖掘或聲音挖掘項目。學生需要分析行業中的真實數據，與市場工程中心的職員緊密合作，為業界的大數據營銷問題提供解決方案。

info.requirement:
For students in MSc in Marketing
Prerequisite: MKTG5011

description.ENG: Under the guidance of supervisors, course participants learn how to write academic essays, e.g. planning, selecting, fixing and examining a topic, and collecting data. They will also be introduced to methods of study, tools of research, analysis of results and process of argumentation. During study, course participants have to attend an open seminar to present the outlines of their reports. Course participants have to keep supervisors informed of progress, ask for periodic consultations and to submit the reports within the prescribed time.
description.ZHS: 学员在导师的指导下，认识如何撰写研究报告，包括构思、选题、拟题、审题、资料蒐集、调查方法、研究工具、结果分析、论证过程等。於修业期间，参与开题报告讲论会，定期谘询导师的意见，讨论研究报告的写作计划与进程，并在期限前完成报告。
description.ZHT: 學員在導師的指導下，認識如何撰寫研究報告，包括構思、選題、擬題、審題、資料蒐集、調查方法、研究工具、結果分析、論證過程等。於修業期間，參與開題報告講論會，定期諮詢導師的意見，討論研究報告的寫作計劃與進程，並在期限前完成報告。

info.requirement: For students in MA Putonghua Education

-.short_title: MSK Rehab: Occ As & Fitn 4 Wk 骨關節復康：職業評估及工作體適能

description.ENG: This is an introduction to the spectrum of musculoskeletal disorders and Rehabilitation issues related to Principle of occupational orthopaedics, background, medicolegal aspects and psychosocial aspect of occupational orthopaedics; Impairment, disability and social standing: assessment and function; Management of specific medical and musculoskeletal problems; Chronic medical condition, Women, children and elderly, musculoskeletal, cognitive impaired patient; Occupation assessment and the work environment; Assessment of work capacity and impairment; Return to work programmes and barriers
description.ZHT: 本科目探討有關一系列職業性骨科疾病及復康問題，包括職業性骨科疾病及背景、職業骨科心理方面及法律事宜的原則、功能及評估：殘疾和社會地位問題，特定的醫療和肌肉骨骼問題管理、慢性疾病，婦女，兒童和老人，長期患者、職業評估和工作環境、工作能力和減值測試、回到工作方案和障礙等。

-.short_title: SCI, Amputation & Rehab Tech 脊髓損傷、截肢康復及復康科技

description.ENG: Rehabilitation technology is fast developing and finds the most applications in spinal cord injury and amputation for musculoskeletal disorders. Combining the previously independent courses into a single course provides a better integrated delivery of information and application.
description.ZHT: 康復技術正在迅速發展，並多數應用在脊髓損傷和截肢相關骨關節疾病。為講授更好的綜合信息和應用，本課程由以前獨立的課程整合成一個單一的課程。

-.short_title: Pain Mgt & Psy-soc Rehab 疼痛治療及復康的社會心理因素

description.ENG: Pain in particular chronic pain of the musculoskeletal system is closely linked to psychosocial consequences of disability and proper management is the key to rehabilitation. The new arrangement will provide a holistic approach, and enables participants to explore more deeply the psychosocial issues that arise from musculoskeletal impairments and disabilities and to prepare them for further studies in health counseling or behaviour therapy. In addition the causes, nature and types of musculoskeletal pain are discussed, and introduction to management including the psychosocial interventions, medications, interventional treatments and alternative treatments including chinese medicine.
description.ZHT: 骨關節系統的慢性疼痛，殘疾和妥善管理所引致的社會心理後果是康復的關鍵。本課程的新安排將提供一個全面的方向，讓同學更深入地探討的骨骼肌肉損傷和殘疾的過程中出現的心理問題，以及健康諮詢或行為療法的進一步了解。此外肌肉骨骼疼痛的原因，性質和類型進行了探討，並介紹包括心理社會介入，藥物治療，介入治療和替代治療，包括中醫中藥等等處理方案。

description.ENG: This programme provides participants with supervised practical experience in one or more chosen fields of rehabilitation or musculoskeletal medicine, so as to broaden their understanding of the different practices in rehabilitation or musculoskeletal medicine, and to deepen their skills or to acquire new skills. Participants should expect to spend one session per week on their chosen field(s) for roughly 6 months, together with tutorials and assignments to fulfill the programme requirements. Participants will propose a programme that best suit their needs, which will be refined with the help of mentors.The practicum sessions could be coordinated by the programme, or in form of recognition of works in Musculoskeletal Rehabilitation in the existing working position with specific tasks to complete.
description.ZHS: This programme provides participants with supervised practical experience in one or more chosen fields of rehabilitation or musculoskeletal medicine, so as to broaden their understanding of the different practices in rehabilitation or musculoskeletal medicine, and to deepen their skills or to acquire new skills. Participants will propose a programme that best suit their needs, which will be refined with the help of mentors.The practicum sessions could be coordinated by the programme, or in form of recognition of works in Musculoskeletal Rehabilitation in the existing working position with specific tasks to complete.
description.ZHT: 本課程提供一個或多個骨關節醫學及康復上不同領域的實習機會，以拓寬同學對康復及骨關節醫學上不同專業的做法的理解，並深化他們的技能或學習新的技能。同學應預計要在連續六個月，每週一次在上所選擇的領域進行課堂及作業，以履行課程的要求。同學應自行提出一個最適合他們需求的方案，不過會在導師協助下加以調整。實習內容及場所可由課程代為統籌，或於本身工作上完成有關骨關節復康上的特定指標。

description.ENG: Under the guidance of supervisors, students learn how to write academic reports in teaching Chinese as an international language, including the conceiving, selection, framing, and examining of a research topic, the data collection methods, the research tools, the results analysis and the argumentation process.  During the course of study, course participants will present their report outlines in open seminars, consult their supervisors about the planning and progress of their report writing, and submit the final reports within the prescribed timeline.

During the course of study, course participants will present their report outlines in open seminars, consult their supervisors about the planning and progress of their report writing, and submit the final reports within the prescribed timeline.
description.ZHT: 學員在導師的指導下，認識如何撰寫教學實踐報告，包括構思、選題、擬題、審題、資料蒐集、調查方法、研究工具、結果分析、論證過程等。於修業期間，參與開題報告講論會，定期諮詢導師的意見，討論報告的寫作計劃與進程，並在期限前完成教學實踐報告。

info.requirement: For students in MA Teaching Chinese as an International Language

-.short_title: SociolinguisticsChin Edu 社會語言學和漢語教育

description.ENG: This module introduces the features of sociolinguistics, its research methods and development.  In particular, it focuses on the current research agenda of sociolinguistics and their developments in China, and aims to cultivate the students’ insights into the language trends in the Hong Kong society while enhancing their language sensibility as well as exposing them to the transformation of languages in social interactions. The students are guided to investigate the current state of Chinese language teaching in Hong Kong and further afield, the phenomenon of language transformation in social communications, issues about Chinese language education in non-Chinese speaking regions.
description.ZHS: This module introduces the features of sociolinguistics, its research methods and development.  In particular, it focuses on the current research agenda of sociolinguistics and their developments in China, and aims to cultivate the students’ insights into the language trends in the Hong Kong society while enhancing their language sensibility as well as exposing them to the transformation of languages in social interactions. The students are guided to investigate the current state of Chinese language teaching in Hong Kong and further afield, the phenomenon of language transformation in social communications, issues about Chinese language education in non-Chinese speaking regions.
description.ZHT: 本單元介紹社會語言學的性質、研究方法和發展情況，特別着重介紹當前中國社會語言學的研究課題與成果，培養學員洞察香港社會語言的種種現象，言語交際中的變異情況，提高學員語言觸覺的能力，從而調查海內外華語文教學現狀，探究語言變異現象，以及探討非華語地區的漢語教育等問題。

description.ENG: This course focuses on developing students' understanding of healthcare management, leadership and the process of health outcome evaluation. Related frameworks for healthcare management, continuous quality improvement and outcome evaluations will be explored to guide students in assuming a managerial role and making quality improvement decisions in their specialty practice.
description.ZHS: 本科旨在让学生了解资深护理人员在评估医疗成效方面所扮演的角色，探讨与组织、领导及转变有关的理论，指导学生在专科实习时作出可以提升护理质素的决定。此外，亦会探索临床督导模式，以促进护理实务及推广健康。
description.ZHT: 本科著重加強學生對醫療管理、護理領導及醫療成效評估程序的了解，探討醫療管理、持續質量改進以及醫療成效評估的模式架構，指導學生在其所屬專科擔任管理層時，作出有助提升護理質素的決定。

info.requirement: For students in Master of Nursing or Doctor of Nursing

title.ENG: Clinical Leadership, Management and Outcome Evaluation
title.ZHT: 臨床領導、管理及成效評核

-.short_title: Scholarly Inquiry Project 學術研究計劃

description.ENG: This course facilitates students to undertake a scholarly inquiry project for knowledge development and transfer. Students are required to complete a research or service innovation project, and are expected to integrate the knowledge that have been obtained from Scholarly Inquiry I & II into this project.
description.ZHS: 本科旨在帮助学生展开一项促进知识发展及知识转移的学术研究计划。学生须运用在学术研究I及II中学到的知识，完成一篇研究论文或者一项学术计划。
description.ZHT: 本科旨在幫助學生展開一項促進知識發展及知識轉移的學術研究計劃。學生須運用在學術研究(一)及(二)中學到的知識，完成一項學術研究或者一項護理服務創新計劃。

info.requirement: For students in Master of Nursing

-.short_title: Fundamentals of Nursing III 基礎護理學 III

description.ENG: This course aims to equip students with fundamental and essential nursing skills for promoting the health and wellness of clients. Emphasis will be placed on promoting students' understanding of the application of basic principles of nursing care to safely help clients meet their basic needs of living.
description.ZHS: 本科旨在帮助学生掌握基本及必要的护理技巧，促进患者健康。课程着重让学生进一步了解基本护理原则的应用，从而安全地帮助患者达到其基本生活需要。
description.ZHT: 本科旨在幫助學生掌握基本及必要的護理技巧，促進患者健康。課程著重讓學生進一步了解基本護理原則的應用，從而安全地幫助患者達到其基本生活需要。

info.requirement: For students in Master of Nursing Science (Pre-registration)

-.short_title: Fundamental Pharmacology 基礎藥劑學

description.ENG: This course aims to enhance students' knowledge related to the principles of pharmacology and drug information resources. It also seeks to stimulate their critical thinking in identifying specific nursing implications for drug therapy and knowledge application in clinical situations.
description.ZHS: 本科旨在加强学生对药剂学相关原理及药物资料库的认识，并学习批判性思考方法，以识别药物治疗对护理的具体影响，以及有关知识的临床应用。
description.ZHT: 本科旨在加強學生對藥劑學相關原理及藥物資料庫的認識，並學習批判性思考方法，以識別藥物治療對護理的具體影響，以及有關知識的臨床應用。

info.requirement: For students in Master of Nursing Science (Pre-registration)

-.short_title: Microbiology 微生物學

description.ENG: This course aims to provide students with basic understanding of microbiology. It emphasizes microorganisms commonly found in human and those that are potentially pathogenic. Methods for prevention and control in the hospital setting are introduced.
description.ZHS: 本科旨在让学生对微生物学有基本的认识，重点介绍常见於人类身上并会引发疾病的微生物，以及在医院内预防及控制微生物的方法。
description.ZHT: 本科旨在讓學生對微生物學有基本的認識，重點介紹常見於人類身上並會引發疾病的微生物，以及在醫院內預防及控制微生物的方法。

info.requirement: For students in Master of Nursing Science (Pre-registration)

-.short_title: Applied Psychology in Nursing 應用心理學與護理

description.ENG: This course aims to provide theoretical basis on the foundations of psychology from a health-illness perspective. It includes the principles of psychology related to health. The consequences of illness and the impact of hospitalization for individuals, families, and society, as well as supportive systems will be examined.
description.ZHS: 本科从一个健康–疾病角度出发，探讨心理学的理论基础，包括与健康有关的心理学原理，亦会探讨疾病带来的影响，入院对个人、家人及社会的影响，支援系统等。
description.ZHT: 本科從一個健康–疾病角度出發，探討心理學的理論基礎，包括與健康有關的心理學原理，亦會探討疾病帶來的影響，入院對個人、家人及社會的影響，支援系統等。

info.requirement: For students in Master of Nursing Science (Pre-registration)

-.short_title: Care for Cli W/ AcuChro Ill I 急性及慢性疾病護理 II

description.ENG: This course emphasizes basic nursing knowledge, particularly the pathophysiological changes and pharmacological treatment of clients with acute and chronic illnesses. Students are equipped with principles of therapeutic management and nursing skills. This will enable them to assess, diagnose, and implement evidence-based nursing interventions in promoting good health outcomes of their clients.
description.ZHS: 本科教导学生基本护理知识，尤其是急性及慢性疾病患者的病理生理变化及药物治疗。学生须掌握治疗管理原理及护理技巧，以便评估、诊断及实施循证护理方案，提升治疗成效，促进患者健康。
description.ZHT: 本科教導學生基本護理知識，尤其是急性及慢性疾病患者的病理生理變化及藥物治療。學生須掌握治療管理原理及護理技巧，以便評估、診斷及實施循證護理方案，提升治療成效，促進患者健康。

info.requirement: For students in Master of Nursing Science (Pre-registration)

title.ENG: Care for Clients with Acute and Chronic Illnesses II
title.ZHS: 急性及慢性疾病护理 II
title.ZHT: 急性及慢性疾病護理 II

-.short_title: Gerontological Nursing 老人科護理

description.ENG: This course aims to provide theoretical and practical information on basic and complex health concepts and issues relevant to the continuum of care for older people. It emphasizes on the application of critical thinking and research evidence in assessing the diagnosed alterations of health among older people. In other words, this provides appropriate nursing interventions in promoting the health of the aged.
description.ZHS: 本科旨在提供与长者持续护理的基本及复杂性健康概念与问题有关的理论与实务资料，强调运用批判思考及科研实证，评估及诊断长者的健康问题，并提供合适的护理措施，促进长者健康。
description.ZHT: 本科旨在提供與長者持續護理的基本及複雜性健康概念與問題有關的理論與實務資料，強調運用批判思考及科研實證，評估長者已確診的健康問題，並提供合適的護理措施，促進長者健康。

info.requirement: For students in Master of Nursing Science (Pre-registration)

-.short_title: Nursing Research 護理研究

description.ENG: This course will provide students with an understanding of nursing research principles to build their knowledge on evidence based nursing. This will be carried out by introducing students to the use of qualitative and quantitative research methods, research designs, and the research questions used in practice. These will enable students to conduct a critical literature review of a particular clinical practice area.
description.ZHS: 本科旨在让学生了解护理科研的原则，帮助他们建立循证护理知识。课程包括介绍定性及定量研究方法，研究设计及研究问卷，使学生可以在个别临床护理范畴进行批判性文献评论。
description.ZHT: 本科旨在讓學生了解護理科研的原則，幫助他們建立循證護理知識。課程包括介紹定性及定量研究方法，研究設計及研究問卷，使學生可以在個別臨床護理範疇進行批判性文獻評論。

info.requirement: For students in Master of Nursing Science (Pre-registration)

-.short_title: Clinical Practice Block IV 臨床實習 IV

description.ENG: These blocks aim to provide students with clinical practice opportunities in order to apply principles, concepts, and theories for the care of clients with various specialty conditions. These conditions include medical, geriatrics, paediatrics, and emergency. In addition, this will allow students to have clinical practice opportunities in caring for pediatric and geriatric clients. The students will be given the chance to practice in both community and hospital settings. They will be assisted in the development of clinical problemsolving skills and on the use of a nursing care plan in clinical settings. This will greatly support students in their transition to become Registered Nurses. Hence, a three-month continuous clinical practice period will be arranged within these clinical practice blocks. Furthermore, students are facilitated to be integrated into the health care team in clinical practice.
description.ZHS: 本科提供临床实习机会，供学生练习在照顾不同专科病人(包括内科、老人科、儿科及急症病人)时，如何应用相关的原则、概念及理论，更有机会临床照顾儿童及年长病者。学生会被安排到社区及医院实习，在导师协助下，掌握解决临床问题的技巧，执行临床护理计划，为成为注册护士作好准备。在临床实习期间，会为学生安排一个连续三个月的临床实习期，亦会帮助他们融入成为临床医护小组的一份子。
description.ZHT: 本科提供臨床實習機會，供學生練習在照顧不同專科病人(包括內科、老人科、兒科及急症病人)時，如何應用相關的原則、概念及理論，更有機會臨床照顧兒童及年長病者。學生會被安排到社區及醫院實習，在導師協助下，掌握解決臨床問題的技巧，執行臨床護理計劃，為成為註冊護士作好準備。在臨床實習期間，會為學生安排一個連續三個月的臨床實習期，亦會幫助他們融入成為臨床醫護小組的一份子。

info.requirement:
For students in Master of Nursing Science (Pre-registration)
Prerequisite: NURS6305

-.short_title: Field Instruction I 實習指導(一)

description.ENG: The course provides opportunities for students to put theories into practice. Students will be placed in a social service setting for supervised practice. Through exposure to reallife situations and a refl ective learning process, the course aims to help students to apply principles and methods of social work intervention in practice, to make differential use of community resources, to function effectively in organizational context, to develop their professional qualities and competence, and then to become an independent professional social worker. Prerequisite: SOWK5951, SOWK5952 and SOWK 5955.

info.requirement: For students in MSSc Social Work; Prerequisite: SOWK5951, SOWK5952, SOWK5955

title.ENG: Field Instruction I (400 hours of supervised practice)

-.short_title: Field Instruction II 實習指導(二)

description.ENG: Prerequisite: SOWK6415.

info.requirement: For students in MSSc Social Work; Prerequisiste: SOWK6415

title.ENG: Field Instruction II (400 hours of supervised practice)

B.short_title: Social Work Research 社會工作研究

description.ENG: This course helps students understand the relationship between social research and social work practice. The basic concepts, approaches, methods and issues in qualitative and quantitative research will be introduced. The course will address the process of formulating research questions and hypotheses, methods of data collection, data analyses, and social work research ethics. Students will examine research methods associated with policy practice, clinical intervention and ethical issues.
description.ZHS: 本科旨在幫助學生瞭解社會研究和社會工作實務的關係。內容將介紹定量和定性研究的一些基本概念、取向、方法和問題。課程將把研究的建構歷程、資料蒐集、資料分析與政策實務、臨床介入和道德問題結合處理。
description.ZHT: 本科旨在幫助學生瞭解社會研究和社會工作實務的關係。內容將介紹定量和定性研究的一些基本概念、取向、方法和問題。課程將把研究的建構歷程、資料蒐集、資料分析與政策實務、臨床介入和道德問題結合處理。

info.requirement: For students in MSSc in Social Work
